products.name: iPhone 15
products.productDescription: Introduces a new design, improved camera system, and the A16 Bionic chip.

products.name: iPhone 15 Plus
products.productDescription: Features a larger display with all the advancements of the iPhone 15.

products.name: iPhone 15 Pro
products.productDescription: Offers advanced photography and videography capabilities, ProMotion display, and premium materials.

products.name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
products.productDescription: The largest and most advanced version, with top-tier specs in the iPhone 15 line.

products.name: Apple Watch Series 9
products.productDescription: Features a new S9 chip, double-tap gesture, and brighter display.

products.name: Apple Watch Ultra 2
products.productDescription: Brings improvements over its predecessor with new health and fitness functionalities, and a robust design for adventurers.

products.name: 15-inch MacBook Air
products.productDescription: Offers a 15.3-inch Liquid Retina display, 1080p FaceTime camera, and up to 18 hours of battery life.

products.name: MacBook Air with M3
products.productDescription: Introduces the new M3 chip offering enhanced performance and energy efficiency.

products.name: Mac mini with M2 and M2 Pro
products.productDescription: Revamps its performance with M2 and M2 Pro chips, delivering impressive power and connectivity in a compact design.

products.name: Mac Studio (2023)
products.productDescription: Boosts creativity with M2 Max and M2 Ultra, delivering exceptional performance in a compact design.

products.name: Mac Pro (2023)
products.productDescription: The ultimate workstation with M3 Pro and M3 Max chip options, targeting professionals seeking peak performance.

products.name: 14-inch iPad Pro
products.productDescription: Introduces a 14-inch screen with Liquid Retina XDR display technologies and ProMotion.

products.name: iPad mini 7th generation
products.productDescription: Refreshes the processor while maintaining the compact design and classic functionalities.

products.name: HomePod (2nd Generation)
products.productDescription: Introduces acoustic enhancements, S7 chip, compatibility with Matter, and new temperature and humidity sensors.

products.name: Apple Reality Pro headset
products.productDescription: AR-VR headset featuring over 10 cameras, various sensors, and an M2 chip alongside a dedicated chip.

products.name: Mini-LED Pro Display XDR
products.productDescription: A new version of the Pro Display XDR featuring Mini-LED technology.
